TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 a l'or %d2 disponible pour le commerce [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 ha %d2 oro disponibile per il commercio [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 tiene %d2 de oro disponible para el comercio [COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 has %d2 gold per turn available for trade[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 a l'or %d2 par tour disponible pour le commerce [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 hat %d2 Gold pro Runde zum Handeln [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 ha %d2 oro per turno disponibile per il commercio [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_COMMERCE]%s1 tiene %d2 de oro por turno disponible para el comercio [COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 will grow to size %d2 on the next turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 deviendra la taille %d2 sur le prochain tour [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Die Bevölkerung von %s1 wächst nächste Runde auf %d2 [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]%s1 crescerà a grandezza %d2 al prossimo turno [COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhealthy on the next turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 deviendra malsain sur le prochain tour [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 wird in der nächsten Runde ungesund [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se volverá insalubre el próximo turno [COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become healthy on the next turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 deviendra sain sur le prochain tour [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 wird in der nächsten Runde gesund [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se volverá sano el próximo turno [COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become unhappy on the next turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 deviendra malheureux sur le prochain tour [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 wird in der nächsten Runde unglücklich [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se volverá infeliz el próximo turno [COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 will become happy on the next turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 deviendra heureux sur le prochain tour [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 wird in der nächsten Runde glücklich [COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 se volverá feliz el próximo turno [COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]The %s1 in %s2 can be hurried for %d3%s4 with %d5%s6 overflow[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]La %s1 à %s2 peut être dépêchée pour %d3%c4 avec %d5%c6 de débordement[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]Die %s1 in %s2 kann eilte für %d3%c4 mit %d5%s6 der Überlauf[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]La costruzione di %s1 a %s2 può essere accelerata per %d3%c4 con %d5%c6 di straripamento[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]La %s1 en %s2 puede ser apresurada para %d3%c4 con %d5%c6 de desbordamiento[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YIELD_FOOD]La costruzione di %s1 a %s2 può essere accelerata per %d3%s4[COLOR_REVERT]
